The Bavarians were focused and energetic from the … [+4820 chars]

articles.title: Stylish Couple Anushka and Virat - India Today
articles.description: There’s no denying that Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli are one of the most loved celebrity couples.
articles.content:
Besides their beautiful chemistry, one thing that fans cant
stop talking about is their fashion game.
